body.p: The FEATURES variable specifies options which affect how portage operates and how packages are compiled. It is **not** used for settings which have a substantial effect upon the resulting generated package.

tr.ti: Automatically runs a cvs add for certain files.
Raise an error if an installing package attempts to overwrite a file which is provided by a different package.
Generate proper digests even when SRC_URI has conditional elements.
Do some extra checks for potentially dangerous situations (eg missing Manifest files).
Drop to non-root privileges for certain phases.
Enables the sandbox even when running non-privileged.
